Name: washington_dc_2005_dcgis_chrtschpt
Abstract: This point dataset represents locations for charter schools in Washington, DC 2007

    <descript>
      <abstract>This point dataset represents locations for charter schools in Washington, DC 2007</abstract>
      <purpose>This data is used for the planning and management of Washington, D.C. by local government agencies.</purpose>
    </descript>

      <timeinfo>
        <sngdate>
          <caldate>04/02/07</caldate>
        </sngdate>
      </timeinfo>
      <current>publication date</current>
    </timeperd>

      <progress>Complete</progress>
      <update>As needed</update>
    </status>

  <dataqual>
    <attracc>
      <attraccr>Data believed to be complete and accurate as of the time period cited. Subject to change. Digital version compared with original source data for accuracy and completeness. Validated by source and/or responsible agency.</attraccr>

    <complete>Data believed to be complete and accurate, subject to change. Digital version compared with original source data for accuracy and completeness. In process of validation by source and/or responsible agency.</complete>
    <posacc>
      <horizpa>
        <horizpar>Validated by source and/or responsible agency.  Points geocoded to the MAR which places points at the visual center of buildings in most cases.</horizpar>
      </horizpa>
      <vertacc>
        <vertaccr>A formal accuracy assessment of the vertical positional information in the data set has either not been conducted, or is not applicable </vertaccr>
      </vertacc>
    </posacc>

      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied from the CD obtained from Washington, DC 2005

Charter schools were identified from lists published by the D.C. Public Charter School website and the D.C. Government. A point shapefile was created by geocoding the addresses. These points were compared to the 1995 orthophotographs, the building footprint layer, and the D.C. Real Property Tax owner points for address and ownership information. The square suffix lot attribute was retained as the link to the data from the D.C. Office of Tax and Revenue. A link to the appropriate website was provided for reference. The geocoded points were then moved to the center of the corresponding buildings and core attributes were added.

All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters.
</procdesc>
        <procdate>2001</procdate>
        <proccont>
          <cntinfo>
            <cntorgp>
              <cntorg>D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer</cntorg>
              <cntper>GIS Data Coordinator</cntper>
            </cntorgp>
            <cntaddr>
              <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype>
              <address>441 4th St NW, Suite 930 South</address>
              <city>Washington</city>
              <state>DC</state>
              <postal>20001</postal>
              <country>USA</country>
            </cntaddr>
            <cntvoice>(202) 727-1761</cntvoice>
            <cntfax>(202) 727-5660</cntfax>
            <cntemail>dcgis@dc.gov</cntemail>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Metadata imported.</procdesc>
        <srcused>C:\DOCUME~1\mark\LOCALS~1\Temp\xml40.tmp</srcused>

        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset updated in June 2003 to reflect additions and subtractions to charter schools in DC for the 2004 school year.</procdesc>
        <procdate>6/17/03</procdate>

        <srcused>Server=zhen_laptop; Service=esri_sde; User=draft; Version=SDE.DEFAULT</srcused>

      <procstep>

      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset updated in September 2003 to reflect two new charter schools in DC for the 2004 school year.</procdesc>
        <procdate>9/16/03</procdate>
        <proccont>
          <cntinfo>
            <cntorgp>
              <cntorg>OCTO</cntorg>
              <cntper>GID Data Coordinator</cntper>
            </cntorgp>
            <cntaddr>
              <addrtype/>
              <address/>
              <city/>
              <state/>
              <postal/>
            </cntaddr>
            <cntvoice>202-727-1761</cntvoice>
            <cntfax>202-727-5660</cntfax>
            <cntemail>dcgis@dc.gov</cntemail>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Using the 2003-04 School year Public Charter School layer, staff updated the location and attributes using DC State Education Office records and the Education Center listings on the DC portal.  These reflect updates for the 2004-2005 school year.  A year suffix was added to the layer name to reflect the representative school year.

For new schools, these locations were compared to the 2002 orthophotographs, the building footprint layer, and the D.C. Real Property Tax owner points for address and ownership information.  A link to the appropriate website was provided for reference. The geocoded points were then moved to the center of the corresponding buildings and core attributes were added.</procdesc>
        <srcused>C:\OCTOGIS\Data\PCSB\ChrtSch03Pt.shp.xml</srcused>
        <procdate>10/05/04</procdate>
        <proccont>
          <cntinfo>
            <cntorgp>
              <cntorg>OCTO</cntorg>
            </cntorgp>
            <cntaddr>
              <addrtype/>
              <address/>
              <city/>
              <state/>
              <postal/>
            </cntaddr>
            <cntvoice/>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied.</procdesc>
        <srcused>C:\OCTOGIS\Data\PCSB\ChrtSch05Pt</srcused>
        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied.</procdesc>
        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied.</procdesc>
        <srcused>Server=10.1.11.13; Service=dcgis_sde; Database=dcgis; User=dcgis; Version=SDE.DEFAULT</srcused>
        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied.</procdesc>
        <srcused>G:\GIS\Public Schools\Shapefiles\ChrtSchPt</srcused>
        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>This dataset was updated in the fall of 2004 by DC GIS. Charter School location and status were verified through public records obtained from DCPS and the D.C. State Education Office. School locations and attributes were added or updated through heads up digitizing from the 2003 aerial photography and through manual data entry. Current for the 2004-05 school year.</procdesc>
        <procdate>1/31/05</procdate>
        <proccont>
          <cntinfo>
            <cntorgp>
              <cntorg>OCTO</cntorg>
            </cntorgp>
            <cntaddr>
              <addrtype/>
              <address/>
              <city/>
              <state/>
              <postal/>
            </cntaddr>
            <cntvoice/>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Metadata imported.</procdesc>
        <srcused>E:\DCGISDATA_WORKSPACE\PCSB\ChrtSch05Pt.shp.xml</srcused>
        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>This dataset was updated in the spring of 2007 by DC GIS. Charter School location and status were verified through public records obtained from DCPS and the D.C. Public Charter School Board. School locations and attributes were added or updated using the Master Address Repository (MAR).  Current for the 2006-07 school year.</procdesc>
        <procdate>4/02/07 </procdate>
        <proccont>
          <cntinfo>
            <cntperp>
              <cntper>GIS Data Coordinator</cntper>
              <cntorg>Office of the Chief Technology Officer</cntorg>
            </cntperp>

              <address>441 4th St NW, Suite 930 South</address>
              <city>Washington</city>
              <state>DC</state>
              <postal>20001</postal>

            </cntaddr>
            <cntvoice/>
            <cntfax>202-727-5660</cntfax>
            <cntemail>dcgis@dc.gov</cntemail>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied from CD obtained from Washington D.C. government</procdesc>
        <srcused>W:\DCGISDATA_WORKSPACE\PCSB\ChrtSch07Pt</srcused>
        <procdate>2007</procdate>
      </procstep>
